title: Harden scheduled sync pagination + checkpointing to prevent partial ingestion (CRM/Support/Product Analytics)

sections.text: Fix scheduled sync runs that stop mid-pagination or resume from the wrong cursor after transient API errors/timeouts, leading to partial or duplicated ingestion. Implement per-connection checkpoint persistence (page/cursor + updated_at watermark) that is only advanced after a page is fully processed and committed. On retry, resume from the last committed checkpoint and ensure idempotent upserts to avoid duplicates across CRM, Support, and Product Analytics integrations.
